actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a temporary suspension of the duty on certain alloys of cobalt.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to temporarily suspend the duties on certain cobalt alloys until June 30, 1982. Repeals the exemption of unwrought metal from the temporary suspension of duties on metal waste and scrap.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a temporary suspension of the duty on certain alloys of cobalt.
